title: Bug 121323 - XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
description: The XML Edit Data Set dialog is not persisting filter information when a plain XPath expression is used. The filtering functionality should be available for those who need it.
OB: Currently, when using a plain XPath expression in the XML Edit Data Set dialog, the filter information is not being persisted.
EB: The filter information should be persisted when using a plain XPath expression in the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
2. Enter a plain XPath expression in the appropriate field.
3. Set a filter value.
4. Close the dialog.
The next time you open the XML Edit Data Set dialog and check the filter settings, they should be persisted.
